name: lorem-ipsum-nn
description: A deterministic Lorem Ipsum generator powered by a simple neural network.

scripts.build: npx esbuild --target=chrome67,edge79,firefox68,safari14 --bundle --global-name=YTgst2yhZeXaCa --sourcemap=linked --minify src/ts/lorem-ipsum.ts --outfile=dist/browser/lorem-ipsum.min.js && npx esbuild --target=chrome67,edge79,firefox68,safari14 --bundle --global-name=YTgst2yhZeXaCa --sourcemap=linked src/ts/lorem-ipsum.ts --outfile=dist/browser/lorem-ipsum.js && npx tsc -b ./src/ts/tsconfig.cjs.json ./src/ts/tsconfig.esm.json && npx tsx scripts/ts-postbuild.ts

author: Dominik Kilian
